descriptionHtml:
Location : North west of white run (Check video link & pictures) 

REQUIRES DRAGONBORN DLC 
***************************************** 
Link to Video of mod http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YiVZ-o_2EjA

Class type : Bezerker/Barbarian/Warrior 

Welcome to a simple but decorative player home,set in the snowy hills above whiterun 
this nord home is made for that warrior/barbarian/bezerker type class.Inside there are 
weapon plaques,cooking pot,storage and a book of followers allowing you to choose from 
a selection of three.Various shrines are also included and some nice decorative static pieces 
are placed around the house,the lighting is low and fits the atmosphere of the player home. 

Features 
************ 
Book of followers (Choice between 3 followers) 
Legendary Battlemage LVL 30 (Powerful spell casting warrior) 
Tamriel Ranger LVL 30 (Tough Archer & Sword and shield fighter) 
Shadow assassin LVL 30 (Stealthy Dual - Weilding Assassin) 

Weapon plaques (6) and weapons (Low Level) 
Storage chest (Full nord armor low level) 
Gold & Supplies 
Cooking area & sleeping quarters 
Blacksmiths Area & Supplies 
Shrines 

Credits 
********* 
Many thanks to Darkfox127 for his help with the scripting 
and creative design,check out his mods and anti-social websites : 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DarkFox127Productions 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DarkFox127Pro 
Steam Group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/df127pronews 
Website: http://www.darkfox127productions.weebly.com 

Thanks for looking....
author: EvilmrPumpkinsNexus
